name: 7 in 1 Emergency Survival Whistle with Compass, Outdoor Multi-Functional Hiking Safety Tool with Lanyard
short_description: 【2 pack】We offer this 7-in-1 multifunctional survival whistle set in a 2-pack, a mix of orange and gray. whistle is made of high-strength, anti fall, and high-temperature resistant ABS engineering materials, demonstrating the reliability of its quality. Each whistle is equipped with a sufficiently long lanyard, which is perfect for tying around backpacks, belts, or necks, making it an extremely practical outdoor tool.

【7 in 1】 This special whistle has 7 functions including emergency whistle, compass, thermometer, LED signal light, magnifying glass, reflector, and miniature sealed compartment. The storage compartment is used to store important personal information, allowing rescue personnel to grasp your situation at the first time. In addition, if assistance is needed in an emergency situation, simply whistle lightly, which is louder and more effective than blowing the whistle with full force.

【Survival function】The magnifying glass attached to the tool can not only enlarge fonts and maps, but also use the principle of sunlight focusing through the magnifying glass to refract sunlight onto dry grass or leaves and generate sparks. The reflector uses the principle of sunlight reflection to indicate your current position to rescue personnel. These interesting features provide Boy Scouts with a great learning and survival experience while participating in outdoor activities.

【Small and lightweight】The whistle weighs only 0.09 pounds and is 4.33 inches long, making it a compact and lightweight outdoor multifunctional tool. It is equipped with a 23 inch lanyard that can be easily hung around the neck without feeling heavy.

【Outdoor Gift】 This 7-in-1 outdoor multifunctional safety whistle is perfect for any enthusiast who enjoys adventure, hiking, driving, mountaineering, or camping activities. It is a great birthday or holiday gift for men, husbands, fathers, scouts, and others.

product_description: Survival Kit Someday when you're lost in the woods, you'll be very, very glad you ordered this compact survival kit. It's the classic camp director's whistle, raised to new heights. The 4-1/2" x 1-1/8" dia orange-plastic treasure hangs around your neck on a yellow nylon cord. On one end, the whistle. On the other, a compass. Unscrew the compass, and it reverses to a signal mirror, and reveals a 2-1/2" deep waterproof compartment for aspirin or medicinal brandy - or for the matches you're going to strike against the 3/4" long sparker. No, it's not overkill for a teacher to wear it on the playground. 'S cool.
